column4: Hi....I was wondering if anyone could tell me what IN BLOODY HELL IS.......sry about that.....its just that I have just installed ubuntu and I seem to have a slight problem.....I dont know the root password....that I didnt give the computer in the first place.....
could anyone help me out here?
there isn't one. you use 'sudo' instead of logging in or using 'su -' to get root
instead of doing 'su -' to get a root shell and then running a bunch of commands, you prefix any commands that require root privileges with 'sudo'
